page.title: 12SPORT IN HACKNEY,ISLINGTON
page.content: There are two major sports centres in Hackney and Islington. They are the Britannia Leisure centre and the Sobell Sports centre. In these centres you can do nearly any sport you like but the most usual activities are probably badmington, table tennis and basketball. At Britannia Leisure centre, Highbury Fields and at Finsbury Park you can play tennis, football, basketball and netball outside. At Finsbury Park there is a cricket pitch and a 400 metre running track. There are football pitches at Market Road (Astroturf) and Tuffnell Park where you can also practise throwing the discus or the javelin. I prefer the Britannia Centre as it has most facilities and is nearest to my home.
